content:
I recently claimed the stream privacy decorations issue
I was not able to understand the issue can someone help me with it? and also to understand the codebase. Thanks in advance
Hi @Harshvardhan Omar, welcome! What’s the issue number?

Chris Bobbe said:

Hi Harshvardhan Omar, welcome! What’s the issue number?

the issue number is 19878

Cool, thanks.

It’s best to have a general plan for how to work on an issue before claiming it.

I see on #19878 that Tim linked to some discussion here on chat.zulip.org, for more background on the issue. Can your questions be answered by reading that discussion?
Yes according to my understanding, we need to include a hash|lock|globe icon before the stream name to specify the privacy of that particular stream.. thanks @Chris Bobbe
